# Using XLConnect
```{r}
library(XLConnect)
df <- readWorksheetFromFile("oilfield_25.xlsx", sheet=1)
summary(df)
```

# Using xlsx
```{r}
library(xlsx)
workbook <- "oilfield_25.xlsx"
mydataframe <- read.xlsx(workbook, 1)
dim(mydataframe)
names(mydataframe)
#summary(mydataframe)
mydataframe$Wellname
```
